[DPA-1 Division deals with Development Cooperation extended through concessional loans offered by India to other countries around the world, namely, Lines of Credit [LOCs] and Concessional Finance Scheme [CFS] . The Division deals with policy matters, loan offers, terms and conditions, project identification and evaluationand project progress monitoring.]

[DPA-II Division deals with capacity development programs for development partner countries through the ITEC scholarships for civilian and military training, deputation of ITEC experts, small grant projects including establishment of IT centres abroad and establishment of Vocational Training Centres in Africa. It also coordinates Colombo Plan activities, South-South Co-operation initiatives and other multilateral development co-operation matters, including coordination on Triangular cooperation for capacity building projects.]
